title: Fire safety
brief_description: Comedian Ross Williams gives a light hearted, but informative overview of what to do in different sorts of fires such as; kitchen fires, car fires, house fires, bush fires, and campfires. The programme also looks at effective use of appropriate fire extinguishers, the importance of smoke detectors and evacuataion plans, and general safety with household items. Produced with the assistance of Avalon Airport Rescue and Fire Fighting Services, NSW Mines Rescue Service and Tasmanian Fire Service.
